title: Bloomberg Markets: Top Court Revives Part of Trump Travel Ban
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Top Court Revives Part of Trump Travel Ban
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Kimberly Robinson Supreme Court Reporter Bloomberg BNA Erik Larson U.S. Legal Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing the U.S. Supreme Court clearing much of President Donald Trump’s travel ban to take effect this week and agreed to hear arguments in the fall, giving the president at least partial vindication for his claims of sweeping power over the nation’s borders. Oliver Renick of Bloomberg News also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
